content: 17 He turned unto the prayer of the destitute, And He hath not despised their prayer.
content_old: 17 He turned unto the prayer of the destitute, And He hath not despised their prayer.

content: 18 This is written for a later generation, And the people created do praise Jah.
content_old: 18 This is written for a later generation, And the people created do praise Jah.

content: 19 For He hath looked From the high place of His sanctuary. Jehovah from heaven unto earth looked attentively,
content_old: 19 For He hath looked From the high place of His sanctuary. Jehovah from heaven unto earth looked attentively,

content: 20 To hear the groan of the prisoner, To loose sons of death,
content_old: 20 To hear the groan of the prisoner, To loose sons of death,

content: 21 To declare in Zion the name of Jehovah, And His praise in Jerusalem,
content_old: 21 To declare in Zion the name of Jehovah, And His praise in Jerusalem,

content: 22 In the peoples being gathered together, And the kingdoms—to serve Jehovah.
content_old: 22 In the peoples being gathered together, And the kingdoms—to serve Jehovah.

content: 23 He hath humbled in the way my power, He hath shortened my days.
content_old: 23 He hath humbled in the way my power, He hath shortened my days.

content: 24 I say, ‘My God, take me not up in the midst of my days,’ Through all generations are Thine years.
content_old: 24 I say, ‘My God, take me not up in the midst of my days,’ Through all generations are Thine years.

content: 25 Beforetime the earth Thou didst found, And the work of Thy hands are the heavens.
content_old: 25 Beforetime the earth Thou didst found, And the work of Thy hands are the heavens.

content: 26 They—They perish, and Thou remainest, And all of them as a garment become old, As clothing Thou changest them, And they are changed.
content_old: 26 They—They perish, and Thou remainest, And all of them as a garment become old, As clothing Thou changest them, And they are changed.

content: 27 And Thou art the same, and Thine years are not finished.
content_old: 27 And Thou art the same, and Thine years are not finished.

content: 1 By David. Bless, O my soul, Jehovah, And all my inward parts—His Holy Name.
content_old: 1 By David. Bless, O my soul, Jehovah, And all my inward parts—His Holy Name.

content: 2 Bless, O my soul, Jehovah, And forget not all His benefits,
content_old: 2 Bless, O my soul, Jehovah, And forget not all His benefits,

content: 3 Who is forgiving all thine iniquities, Who is healing all thy diseases,
content_old: 3 Who is forgiving all thine iniquities, Who is healing all thy diseases,

content: 4 Who is redeeming from destruction thy life, Who is crowning thee—kindness and mercies,
content_old: 4 Who is redeeming from destruction thy life, Who is crowning thee—kindness and mercies,

content: 5 Who is satisfying with good thy desire, Renew itself as an eagle doth thy youth.
content_old: 5 Who is satisfying with good thy desire, Renew itself as an eagle doth thy youth.

content: 6 Jehovah is doing righteousness and judgments For all the oppressed.
content_old: 6 Jehovah is doing righteousness and judgments For all the oppressed.

content: 7 He maketh known His ways to Moses, To the sons of Israel His acts.
content_old: 7 He maketh known His ways to Moses, To the sons of Israel His acts.

content: 8 Merciful and gracious is Jehovah, Slow to anger, and abundant in mercy.
content_old: 8 Merciful and gracious is Jehovah, Slow to anger, and abundant in mercy.

content: 9 Not for ever doth He strive, Nor to the age doth He watch.
content_old: 9 Not for ever doth He strive, Nor to the age doth He watch.

content: 10 Not according to our sins hath He done to us, Nor according to our iniquities Hath He conferred benefits upon us.
content_old: 10 Not according to our sins hath He done to us, Nor according to our iniquities Hath He conferred benefits upon us.

content: 11 For, as the height of the heavens is above the earth, His kindness hath been mighty over those fearing Him.
content_old: 11 For, as the height of the heavens is above the earth, His kindness hath been mighty over those fearing Him.

content: 12 As the distance of east from west He hath put far from us our transgressions.
content_old: 12 As the distance of east from west He hath put far from us our transgressions.

content: 13 As a father hath mercy on sons, Jehovah hath mercy on those fearing Him.
content_old: 13 As a father hath mercy on sons, Jehovah hath mercy on those fearing Him.

content: 14 For He hath known our frame, Remembering that we are dust.
content_old: 14 For He hath known our frame, Remembering that we are dust.

content: 15 Mortal man! as grass are his days, As a flower of the field so he flourisheth;
content_old: 15 Mortal man! as grass are his days, As a flower of the field so he flourisheth;

content: 16 For a wind hath passed over it, and it is not, And its place doth not discern it any more.
content_old: 16 For a wind hath passed over it, and it is not, And its place doth not discern it any more.

content: 17 And the kindness of Jehovah Is from age even unto age on those fearing Him, And His righteousness to sons’ sons,
content_old: 17 And the kindness of Jehovah Is from age even unto age on those fearing Him, And His righteousness to sons’ sons,

content: 18 To those keeping His covenant, And to those remembering His precepts to do them.
content_old: 18 To those keeping His covenant, And to those remembering His precepts to do them.

content: 19 Jehovah in the heavens Hath established His throne, And His kingdom over all hath ruled.
content_old: 19 Jehovah in the heavens Hath established His throne, And His kingdom over all hath ruled.

content: 20 Bless Jehovah, ye His messengers, Mighty in power—doing His word, To hearken to the voice of His Word.
content_old: 20 Bless Jehovah, ye His messengers, Mighty in power—doing His word, To hearken to the voice of His Word.

content: 21 Bless Jehovah, all ye His hosts, His ministers—doing His pleasure.
content_old: 21 Bless Jehovah, all ye His hosts, His ministers—doing His pleasure.

content: 1 Bless, O my soul, Jehovah! Jehovah, my God, Thou hast been very great, Honour and majesty Thou hast put on.
content_old: 1 Bless, O my soul, Jehovah! Jehovah, my God, Thou hast been very great, Honour and majesty Thou hast put on.

content: 2 Covering himself with light as a garment, Stretching out the heavens as a curtain,
content_old: 2 Covering himself with light as a garment, Stretching out the heavens as a curtain,

content: 3 Who is laying the beam of His upper chambers in the waters, Who is making thick clouds His chariot, Who is walking on wings of wind,
content_old: 3 Who is laying the beam of His upper chambers in the waters, Who is making thick clouds His chariot, Who is walking on wings of wind,

content: 4 Making His messengers—the winds, His ministers—the flaming fire.
content_old: 4 Making His messengers—the winds, His ministers—the flaming fire.

content: 5 He hath founded earth on its bases, It is not moved to the age and for ever.
content_old: 5 He hath founded earth on its bases, It is not moved to the age and for ever.

content: 6 The abyss! as with clothing Thou hast covered it, Above hills do waters stand.
content_old: 6 The abyss! as with clothing Thou hast covered it, Above hills do waters stand.

content: 7 From Thy rebuke they flee, From the voice of Thy thunder haste away.
content_old: 7 From Thy rebuke they flee, From the voice of Thy thunder haste away.

content: 8 They go up hills—they go down valleys, Unto a place Thou hast founded for them.
content_old: 8 They go up hills—they go down valleys, Unto a place Thou hast founded for them.

content: 9 A border Thou hast set, they pass not over, They turn not back to cover the earth.
content_old: 9 A border Thou hast set, they pass not over, They turn not back to cover the earth.

content: 10 Who is sending forth fountains in valleys, Between hills they go on.
content_old: 10 Who is sending forth fountains in valleys, Between hills they go on.

content: 11 They water every beast of the field, Wild asses break their thirst.
content_old: 11 They water every beast of the field, Wild asses break their thirst.

content: 12 By them the fowl of the heavens doth dwell, From between the branches They give forth the voice.
content_old: 12 By them the fowl of the heavens doth dwell, From between the branches They give forth the voice.

content: 13 Watering hills from His upper chambers, From the fruit of Thy works is the earth satisfied.
content_old: 13 Watering hills from His upper chambers, From the fruit of Thy works is the earth satisfied.

content: 14 Causing grass to spring up for cattle, And herb for the service of man, To bring forth bread from the earth,
content_old: 14 Causing grass to spring up for cattle, And herb for the service of man, To bring forth bread from the earth,

content: 15 And wine—it rejoiceth the heart of man, To cause the face to shine from oil, And bread—the heart of man it supporteth.
content_old: 15 And wine—it rejoiceth the heart of man, To cause the face to shine from oil, And bread—the heart of man it supporteth.

content: 16 Satisfied are the trees of Jehovah, Cedars of Lebanon that He hath planted,
content_old: 16 Satisfied are the trees of Jehovah, Cedars of Lebanon that He hath planted,

content: 17 Where birds do make nests, The stork—the firs are her house.
content_old: 17 Where birds do make nests, The stork—the firs are her house.

content: 18 The high hills are for wild goats, Rocks are a refuge for conies,
content_old: 18 The high hills are for wild goats, Rocks are a refuge for conies,

content: 19 He made the moon for seasons, The sun hath known his place of entrance.
content_old: 19 He made the moon for seasons, The sun hath known his place of entrance.

content: 20 Thou settest darkness, and it is night, In it doth every beast of the forest creep.
content_old: 20 Thou settest darkness, and it is night, In it doth every beast of the forest creep.

content: 21 The young lions are roaring for prey, And to seek from God their food.
content_old: 21 The young lions are roaring for prey, And to seek from God their food.

content: 22 The sun riseth, they are gathered, And in their dens they crouch.
content_old: 22 The sun riseth, they are gathered, And in their dens they crouch.

content: 23 Man goeth forth to his work, And to his service—till evening.
content_old: 23 Man goeth forth to his work, And to his service—till evening.

content: 24 How many have been Thy works, O Jehovah, All of them in wisdom Thou hast made, Full is the earth of thy possessions.
content_old: 24 How many have been Thy works, O Jehovah, All of them in wisdom Thou hast made, Full is the earth of thy possessions.

content: 25 This, the sea, great and broad of sides, There are moving things—innumerable, Living creatures—small with great.
content_old: 25 This, the sea, great and broad of sides, There are moving things—innumerable, Living creatures—small with great.

content: 26 There do ships go: leviathan, That Thou hast formed to play in it.
content_old: 26 There do ships go: leviathan, That Thou hast formed to play in it.

content: 27 All of them unto Thee do look, To give their food in its season.
content_old: 27 All of them unto Thee do look, To give their food in its season.

content: 28 Thou dost give to them—they gather, Thou dost open Thy hand—they are satisfied with good.
content_old: 28 Thou dost give to them—they gather, Thou dost open Thy hand—they are satisfied with good.

content: 29 Thou hidest Thy face—they are troubled, Thou gatherest their spirit—they expire, And unto their dust they turn back.
content_old: 29 Thou hidest Thy face—they are troubled, Thou gatherest their spirit—they expire, And unto their dust they turn back.

content: 30 Thou sendest out Thy Spirit, they are created, And Thou renewest the face of the ground.
content_old: 30 Thou sendest out Thy Spirit, they are created, And Thou renewest the face of the ground.

content: 31 The honour of Jehovah is to the age, Jehovah rejoiceth in His works,
content_old: 31 The honour of Jehovah is to the age, Jehovah rejoiceth in His works,

content: 32 Who is looking to earth, and it trembleth, He cometh against hills, and they smoke.
content_old: 32 Who is looking to earth, and it trembleth, He cometh against hills, and they smoke.

content: 33 I sing to Jehovah during my life, I sing praise to my God while I exist.
content_old: 33 I sing to Jehovah during my life, I sing praise to my God while I exist.

content: 34 Sweet is my meditation on Him, I—I do rejoice in Jehovah.
content_old: 34 Sweet is my meditation on Him, I—I do rejoice in Jehovah.

content: 1 Give ye thanks to Jehovah—call ye in His name, Make known among the peoples His acts.
content_old: 1 Give ye thanks to Jehovah—call ye in His name, Make known among the peoples His acts.

content: 2 Sing ye to Him—sing praise to Him, Meditate ye on all His wonders.
content_old: 2 Sing ye to Him—sing praise to Him, Meditate ye on all His wonders.

content: 3 Boast yourselves in His Holy Name, The heart of those seeking Jehovah rejoiceth.
content_old: 3 Boast yourselves in His Holy Name, The heart of those seeking Jehovah rejoiceth.

content: 4 Seek ye Jehovah and His strength, Seek ye His face continually.
content_old: 4 Seek ye Jehovah and His strength, Seek ye His face continually.

content: 5 Remember His wonders that He did, His signs and the judgments of His mouth.
content_old: 5 Remember His wonders that He did, His signs and the judgments of His mouth.

content: 6 O seed of Abraham, His servant, O sons of Jacob, His chosen ones.
content_old: 6 O seed of Abraham, His servant, O sons of Jacob, His chosen ones.

content: 7 He is Jehovah our God, In all the earth are His judgments.
content_old: 7 He is Jehovah our God, In all the earth are His judgments.

content: 8 He hath remembered to the age His covenant, The word He commanded to a thousand generations,
content_old: 8 He hath remembered to the age His covenant, The word He commanded to a thousand generations,

content: 9 That He hath made with Abraham, And His oath to Isaac,
content_old: 9 That He hath made with Abraham, And His oath to Isaac,

content: 10 And doth establish it to Jacob for a statute, To Israel—a covenant age-during,
content_old: 10 And doth establish it to Jacob for a statute, To Israel—a covenant age-during,

content: 11 Saying, ‘To thee I give the land of Canaan, The portion of your inheritance,’
content_old: 11 Saying, ‘To thee I give the land of Canaan, The portion of your inheritance,’

content: 12 In their being few in number, But a few, and sojourners in it.
content_old: 12 In their being few in number, But a few, and sojourners in it.

content: 13 And they go up and down, from nation unto nation, From a kingdom unto another people.
content_old: 13 And they go up and down, from nation unto nation, From a kingdom unto another people.

content: 14 He hath not suffered any to oppress them And He reproveth for their sakes kings.
content_old: 14 He hath not suffered any to oppress them And He reproveth for their sakes kings.

content: 15 ‘Strike not against Mine anointed, And to My prophets do not evil.’
content_old: 15 ‘Strike not against Mine anointed, And to My prophets do not evil.’

content: 16 And He calleth a famine on the land, The whole staff of bread He hath broken.
content_old: 16 And He calleth a famine on the land, The whole staff of bread He hath broken.

content: 17 He hath sent before them a man, For a servant hath Joseph been sold.
content_old: 17 He hath sent before them a man, For a servant hath Joseph been sold.

content: 18 They have afflicted with fetters his feet, Iron hath entered his soul,
content_old: 18 They have afflicted with fetters his feet, Iron hath entered his soul,

content: 19 Till the time of the coming of His word The saying of Jehovah hath tried him.
content_old: 19 Till the time of the coming of His word The saying of Jehovah hath tried him.

content: 20 The king hath sent, and looseth him, The ruler of the peoples, and draweth him out.
content_old: 20 The king hath sent, and looseth him, The ruler of the peoples, and draweth him out.

content: 21 He hath made him lord of his house, And ruler over all his possessions.
content_old: 21 He hath made him lord of his house, And ruler over all his possessions.

content: 22 To bind his chiefs at his pleasure, And his elders he maketh wise.
content_old: 22 To bind his chiefs at his pleasure, And his elders he maketh wise.

content: 23 And Israel cometh in to Egypt, And Jacob hath sojourned in the land of Ham.
content_old: 23 And Israel cometh in to Egypt, And Jacob hath sojourned in the land of Ham.

content: 24 And He maketh His people very fruitful, And maketh it mightier than its adversaries.
content_old: 24 And He maketh His people very fruitful, And maketh it mightier than its adversaries.

content: 25 He turned their heart to hate His people, To conspire against His servants.
content_old: 25 He turned their heart to hate His people, To conspire against His servants.

content: 26 He hath sent Moses His servant, Aaron whom He had fixed on.
content_old: 26 He hath sent Moses His servant, Aaron whom He had fixed on.

content: 27 They have set among them the matters of His signs, And wonders in the land of Ham.
content_old: 27 They have set among them the matters of His signs, And wonders in the land of Ham.

content: 28 He hath sent darkness, and it is dark, And they have not provoked His word.
content_old: 28 He hath sent darkness, and it is dark, And they have not provoked His word.

content: 29 He hath turned their waters to blood, And putteth to death their fish.
content_old: 29 He hath turned their waters to blood, And putteth to death their fish.

content: 30 Teemed hath their land with frogs, In the inner chambers of their kings.
content_old: 30 Teemed hath their land with frogs, In the inner chambers of their kings.

content: 31 He hath said, and the beetle cometh, Lice into all their border.
content_old: 31 He hath said, and the beetle cometh, Lice into all their border.

content: 32 He hath made their showers hail, A flaming fire is in their land.
content_old: 32 He hath made their showers hail, A flaming fire is in their land.

content: 33 And He smiteth their vine and their fig, And shivereth the trees of their border.
content_old: 33 And He smiteth their vine and their fig, And shivereth the trees of their border.

content: 34 He hath said, and the locust cometh, And the cankerworm—innumerable,
content_old: 34 He hath said, and the locust cometh, And the cankerworm—innumerable,

content: 35 And it consumeth every herb in their land, And it consumeth the fruit of their ground.
content_old: 35 And it consumeth every herb in their land, And it consumeth the fruit of their ground.

content: 36 And He smiteth every first-born in their land, The first-fruit of all their strength,
content_old: 36 And He smiteth every first-born in their land, The first-fruit of all their strength,

content: 37 And bringeth them out with silver and gold, And there is not in its tribes a feeble one.
content_old: 37 And bringeth them out with silver and gold, And there is not in its tribes a feeble one.

content: 38 Rejoiced hath Egypt in their going forth, For their fear had fallen upon them.
content_old: 38 Rejoiced hath Egypt in their going forth, For their fear had fallen upon them.

content: 39 He hath spread a cloud for a covering, And fire to enlighten the night.
content_old: 39 He hath spread a cloud for a covering, And fire to enlighten the night.

content: 40 They have asked, and He bringeth quails, And with bread of heaven satisfieth them.
content_old: 40 They have asked, and He bringeth quails, And with bread of heaven satisfieth them.

content: 41 He hath opened a rock, and waters issue, They have gone on in dry places—a river.
content_old: 41 He hath opened a rock, and waters issue, They have gone on in dry places—a river.

content: 42 For He hath remembered His holy word, With Abraham His servant,
content_old: 42 For He hath remembered His holy word, With Abraham His servant,

content: 43 And He bringeth forth His people with joy, With singing His chosen ones.
content_old: 43 And He bringeth forth His people with joy, With singing His chosen ones.

content: 44 And He giveth to them the lands of nations, And the labour of peoples they possess,
content_old: 44 And He giveth to them the lands of nations, And the labour of peoples they possess,

content: 1 Praise ye Jah, give thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age, is His kindness.
content_old: 1 Praise ye Jah, give thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age, is His kindness.

content: 2 Who doth utter the mighty acts of Jehovah? Soundeth all His praise?
content_old: 2 Who doth utter the mighty acts of Jehovah? Soundeth all His praise?

content: 3 O the happiness of those keeping judgment, Doing righteousness at all times.
content_old: 3 O the happiness of those keeping judgment, Doing righteousness at all times.

content: 4 Remember me, O Jehovah, With the favour of Thy people, Look after me in Thy salvation.
content_old: 4 Remember me, O Jehovah, With the favour of Thy people, Look after me in Thy salvation.

content: 5 To look on the good of Thy chosen ones, To rejoice in the joy of Thy nation, To boast myself with Thine inheritance.
content_old: 5 To look on the good of Thy chosen ones, To rejoice in the joy of Thy nation, To boast myself with Thine inheritance.

content: 6 We have sinned with our fathers, We have done perversely, we have done wickedly.
content_old: 6 We have sinned with our fathers, We have done perversely, we have done wickedly.

content: 7 Our fathers in Egypt, Have not considered wisely Thy wonders, They have not remembered The abundance of Thy kind acts, And provoke by the sea, at the sea of Suph.
content_old: 7 Our fathers in Egypt, Have not considered wisely Thy wonders, They have not remembered The abundance of Thy kind acts, And provoke by the sea, at the sea of Suph.

content: 8 And He saveth them for His name’s sake, To make known His might,
content_old: 8 And He saveth them for His name’s sake, To make known His might,

content: 9 And rebuketh the sea of Suph, and it is dried up, And causeth them to go Through depths as a wilderness.
content_old: 9 And rebuketh the sea of Suph, and it is dried up, And causeth them to go Through depths as a wilderness.

content: 10 And He saveth them from the hand Of him who is hating, And redeemeth them from the hand of the enemy.
content_old: 10 And He saveth them from the hand Of him who is hating, And redeemeth them from the hand of the enemy.

content: 11 And waters cover their adversaries, One of them hath not been left.
content_old: 11 And waters cover their adversaries, One of them hath not been left.

content: 12 And they believe in His words, they sing His praise,
content_old: 12 And they believe in His words, they sing His praise,

content: 13 They have hasted—forgotten His works, They have not waited for His counsel.
content_old: 13 They have hasted—forgotten His works, They have not waited for His counsel.

content: 14 And they lust greatly in a wilderness, And try God in a desert.
content_old: 14 And they lust greatly in a wilderness, And try God in a desert.

content: 15 And He giveth to them their request, And sendeth leanness into their soul.
content_old: 15 And He giveth to them their request, And sendeth leanness into their soul.

content: 16 And they are envious of Moses in the camp, Of Aaron, Jehovah’s holy one.
content_old: 16 And they are envious of Moses in the camp, Of Aaron, Jehovah’s holy one.

content: 17 Earth openeth, and swalloweth up Dathan, And covereth over the company of Abiram.
content_old: 17 Earth openeth, and swalloweth up Dathan, And covereth over the company of Abiram.

content: 18 And fire burneth among their company, A flame setteth on fire the wicked.
content_old: 18 And fire burneth among their company, A flame setteth on fire the wicked.

content: 19 They make a calf in Horeb, And bow themselves to a molten image,
content_old: 19 They make a calf in Horeb, And bow themselves to a molten image,

content: 20 And change their Honour Into the form of an ox eating herbs.
content_old: 20 And change their Honour Into the form of an ox eating herbs.

content: 21 They have forgotten God their saviour, The doer of great things in Egypt,
content_old: 21 They have forgotten God their saviour, The doer of great things in Egypt,

content: 22 Of wonderful things in the land of Ham, Of fearful things by the sea of Suph.
content_old: 22 Of wonderful things in the land of Ham, Of fearful things by the sea of Suph.

content: 23 And He saith to destroy them, Unless Moses, His chosen one, Had stood in the breach before Him, To turn back His wrath from destroying.
content_old: 23 And He saith to destroy them, Unless Moses, His chosen one, Had stood in the breach before Him, To turn back His wrath from destroying.

content: 24 And they kick against the desirable land, They have not given credence to His word.
content_old: 24 And they kick against the desirable land, They have not given credence to His word.

content: 25 And they murmur in their tents, They have not hearkened to the voice of Jehovah.
content_old: 25 And they murmur in their tents, They have not hearkened to the voice of Jehovah.

content: 26 And He lifteth up His hand to them, To cause them to fall in a wilderness,
content_old: 26 And He lifteth up His hand to them, To cause them to fall in a wilderness,

content: 27 And to cause their seed to fall among nations, And to scatter them through lands.
content_old: 27 And to cause their seed to fall among nations, And to scatter them through lands.

content: 28 And they are coupled to Baal-Peor, And eat the sacrifices of the dead,
content_old: 28 And they are coupled to Baal-Peor, And eat the sacrifices of the dead,

content: 29 And they provoke to anger by their actions, And a plague breaketh forth upon them,
content_old: 29 And they provoke to anger by their actions, And a plague breaketh forth upon them,

content: 30 And Phinehas standeth, and executeth judgment, And the plague is restrained,
content_old: 30 And Phinehas standeth, and executeth judgment, And the plague is restrained,

content: 31 And it is reckoned to him to righteousness, To all generations—unto the age.
content_old: 31 And it is reckoned to him to righteousness, To all generations—unto the age.

content: 32 And they cause wrath by the waters of Meribah, And it is evil to Moses for their sakes,
content_old: 32 And they cause wrath by the waters of Meribah, And it is evil to Moses for their sakes,

content: 33 For they have provoked his spirit, And he speaketh wrongfully with his lips.
content_old: 33 For they have provoked his spirit, And he speaketh wrongfully with his lips.

content: 34 They have not destroyed the peoples, As Jehovah had said to them,
content_old: 34 They have not destroyed the peoples, As Jehovah had said to them,

content: 35 And mix themselves among nations, and learn their works,
content_old: 35 And mix themselves among nations, and learn their works,

content: 36 And serve their idols, And they are to them for a snare.
content_old: 36 And serve their idols, And they are to them for a snare.

content: 37 And they sacrifice their sons And their daughters to destroyers,
content_old: 37 And they sacrifice their sons And their daughters to destroyers,

content: 38 And they shed innocent blood—Blood of their sons and of their daughters, Whom they have sacrificed to idols of Canaan, And the land is profaned with blood.
content_old: 38 And they shed innocent blood—Blood of their sons and of their daughters, Whom they have sacrificed to idols of Canaan, And the land is profaned with blood.

content: 39 And they are defiled with their works, And commit whoredom in their habitual doings.
content_old: 39 And they are defiled with their works, And commit whoredom in their habitual doings.

content: 40 And the anger of Jehovah Is kindled against His people, And He doth abominate His inheritance.
content_old: 40 And the anger of Jehovah Is kindled against His people, And He doth abominate His inheritance.

content: 41 And giveth them into the hand of nations, And those hating them rule over them,
content_old: 41 And giveth them into the hand of nations, And those hating them rule over them,

content: 42 And their enemies oppress them, And they are humbled under their hand.
content_old: 42 And their enemies oppress them, And they are humbled under their hand.

content: 43 Many times He doth deliver them, And they rebel in their counsel, And they are brought low in their iniquity.
content_old: 43 Many times He doth deliver them, And they rebel in their counsel, And they are brought low in their iniquity.

content: 44 And He looketh on their distress When He heareth their cry,
content_old: 44 And He looketh on their distress When He heareth their cry,

content: 45 And remembereth for them His covenant, And is comforted, According to the abundance of His kindness.
content_old: 45 And remembereth for them His covenant, And is comforted, According to the abundance of His kindness.

content: 46 And He appointeth them for mercies Before all their captors.
content_old: 46 And He appointeth them for mercies Before all their captors.

content: 47 Save us, O Jehovah our God, and gather us from the nations, To give thanks to Thy holy name, To glory in Thy praise.
content_old: 47 Save us, O Jehovah our God, and gather us from the nations, To give thanks to Thy holy name, To glory in Thy praise.

content: 1 ‘Give ye thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age is His kindness:’
content_old: 1 ‘Give ye thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age is His kindness:’

content: 2 Let the redeemed of Jehovah say, Whom He redeemed from the hand of an adversary.
content_old: 2 Let the redeemed of Jehovah say, Whom He redeemed from the hand of an adversary.

content: 3 And from the lands hath gathered them, From east and from west, From north, and from the sea.
content_old: 3 And from the lands hath gathered them, From east and from west, From north, and from the sea.

content: 4 They wandered in a wilderness, in a desert by the way, A city of habitation they have not found.
content_old: 4 They wandered in a wilderness, in a desert by the way, A city of habitation they have not found.

content: 5 Hungry—yea—thirsty, Their soul in them becometh feeble,
content_old: 5 Hungry—yea—thirsty, Their soul in them becometh feeble,

content: 6 And they cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distress He delivereth them,
content_old: 6 And they cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distress He delivereth them,

content: 7 And causeth them to tread in a right way, To go unto a city of habitation.
content_old: 7 And causeth them to tread in a right way, To go unto a city of habitation.

content: 8 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men.
content_old: 8 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men.

content: 9 For He hath satisfied a longing soul, And a hungry soul hath filled with goodness.
content_old: 9 For He hath satisfied a longing soul, And a hungry soul hath filled with goodness.

content: 10 Inhabitants of dark places and death-shade, Prisoners of affliction and of iron,
content_old: 10 Inhabitants of dark places and death-shade, Prisoners of affliction and of iron,

content: 11 Because they changed the saying of God, And the counsel of the Most High despised.
content_old: 11 Because they changed the saying of God, And the counsel of the Most High despised.

content: 12 And He humbleth with labour their heart, They have been feeble, and there is no helper.
content_old: 12 And He humbleth with labour their heart, They have been feeble, and there is no helper.

content: 13 And they cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distresses He saveth them.
content_old: 13 And they cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distresses He saveth them.

content: 14 He bringeth them out from the dark place, And death-shade, And their bands He draweth away.
content_old: 14 He bringeth them out from the dark place, And death-shade, And their bands He draweth away.

content: 15 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men.
content_old: 15 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men.

content: 16 For He hath broken doors of brass, And bars of iron He hath cut.
content_old: 16 For He hath broken doors of brass, And bars of iron He hath cut.

content: 17 Fools, by means of their transgression, And by their iniquities, afflict themselves.
content_old: 17 Fools, by means of their transgression, And by their iniquities, afflict themselves.

content: 18 All food doth their soul abominate, And they come nigh unto the gates of death,
content_old: 18 All food doth their soul abominate, And they come nigh unto the gates of death,

content: 19 And cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distresses He saveth them,
content_old: 19 And cry unto Jehovah in their adversity, From their distresses He saveth them,

content: 20 He sendeth His word and healeth them, And delivereth from their destructions.
content_old: 20 He sendeth His word and healeth them, And delivereth from their destructions.

content: 21 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men,
content_old: 21 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men,

content: 22 And they sacrifice sacrifices of thanksgiving, And recount His works with singing.
content_old: 22 And they sacrifice sacrifices of thanksgiving, And recount His works with singing.

content: 23 Those going down to the sea in ships, Doing business in many waters,
content_old: 23 Those going down to the sea in ships, Doing business in many waters,

content: 24 They have seen the works of Jehovah, And His wonders in the deep.
content_old: 24 They have seen the works of Jehovah, And His wonders in the deep.

content: 25 And He saith, and appointeth a tempest, And it lifteth up its billows,
content_old: 25 And He saith, and appointeth a tempest, And it lifteth up its billows,

content: 26 They go up to the heavens, they go down to the depths, Their soul in evil is melted.
content_old: 26 They go up to the heavens, they go down to the depths, Their soul in evil is melted.

content: 27 They reel to and fro, and move as a drunkard, And all their wisdom is swallowed up.
content_old: 27 They reel to and fro, and move as a drunkard, And all their wisdom is swallowed up.

content: 28 And they cry to Jehovah in their adversity, And from their distresses He bringeth them out.
content_old: 28 And they cry to Jehovah in their adversity, And from their distresses He bringeth them out.

content: 29 He establisheth a whirlwind to a calm, And hushed are their billows.
content_old: 29 He establisheth a whirlwind to a calm, And hushed are their billows.

content: 30 And they rejoice because they are quiet, And He leadeth them to the haven of their desire.
content_old: 30 And they rejoice because they are quiet, And He leadeth them to the haven of their desire.

content: 31 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men,
content_old: 31 They confess to Jehovah His kindness, And His wonders to the sons of men,

content: 32 And they exalt Him in the assembly of the people, And in the seat of the elders praise Him.
content_old: 32 And they exalt Him in the assembly of the people, And in the seat of the elders praise Him.

content: 33 He maketh rivers become a wilderness, And fountains of waters become dry land.
content_old: 33 He maketh rivers become a wilderness, And fountains of waters become dry land.

content: 34 A fruitful land becometh a barren place, For the wickedness of its inhabitants.
content_old: 34 A fruitful land becometh a barren place, For the wickedness of its inhabitants.

content: 35 He maketh a wilderness become a pool of water, And a dry land become fountains of waters.
content_old: 35 He maketh a wilderness become a pool of water, And a dry land become fountains of waters.

content: 36 And He causeth the hungry to dwell there, And they prepare a city of habitation.
content_old: 36 And He causeth the hungry to dwell there, And they prepare a city of habitation.

content: 37 And they sow fields, and plant vineyards, And they make fruits of increase.
content_old: 37 And they sow fields, and plant vineyards, And they make fruits of increase.

content: 38 And He blesseth them, and they multiply exceedingly, And their cattle He doth not diminish.
content_old: 38 And He blesseth them, and they multiply exceedingly, And their cattle He doth not diminish.

content: 39 And they are diminished, and bow down, By restraint, evil, and sorrow.
content_old: 39 And they are diminished, and bow down, By restraint, evil, and sorrow.

content: 40 He is pouring contempt upon nobles, And causeth them to wander in vacancy—no way.
content_old: 40 He is pouring contempt upon nobles, And causeth them to wander in vacancy—no way.

content: 41 And setteth on high the needy from affliction, And placeth families as a flock.
content_old: 41 And setteth on high the needy from affliction, And placeth families as a flock.

content: 42 The upright do see and rejoice, And all perversity hath shut her mouth.
content_old: 42 The upright do see and rejoice, And all perversity hath shut her mouth.

content: 1 A Song, a Psalm of David. Prepared is my heart, O God, I sing, yea, I sing praise, also my honour.
content_old: 1 A Song, a Psalm of David. Prepared is my heart, O God, I sing, yea, I sing praise, also my honour.

content: 2 Awake, psaltery and harp, I awake the dawn.
content_old: 2 Awake, psaltery and harp, I awake the dawn.

content: 3 I thank Thee among peoples, O Jehovah, And I praise Thee among the nations.
content_old: 3 I thank Thee among peoples, O Jehovah, And I praise Thee among the nations.

content: 4 For great above the heavens is Thy kindness, And unto the clouds Thy truth.
content_old: 4 For great above the heavens is Thy kindness, And unto the clouds Thy truth.

content: 5 Be Thou exalted above the heavens, O God, And above all the earth Thy honour.
content_old: 5 Be Thou exalted above the heavens, O God, And above all the earth Thy honour.

content: 6 That Thy beloved ones may be delivered, Save with Thy right hand, and answer us.
content_old: 6 That Thy beloved ones may be delivered, Save with Thy right hand, and answer us.

content: 7 God hath spoken in His holiness: I exult, I apportion Shechem, And the valley of Succoth I measure,
content_old: 7 God hath spoken in His holiness: I exult, I apportion Shechem, And the valley of Succoth I measure,

content: 8 Mine is Gilead, mine is Manasseh, And Ephraim is the strength of my head, Judah is my lawgiver,
content_old: 8 Mine is Gilead, mine is Manasseh, And Ephraim is the strength of my head, Judah is my lawgiver,

content: 9 Moab is a pot for my washing, Upon Edom I cast my shoe, Over Philistia I shout habitually.
content_old: 9 Moab is a pot for my washing, Upon Edom I cast my shoe, Over Philistia I shout habitually.

content: 10 Who doth bring me in to the fenced city? Who hath led me unto Edom?
content_old: 10 Who doth bring me in to the fenced city? Who hath led me unto Edom?

content: 11 Hast not Thou, O God, cast us off? And Thou goest not out, O God, with our hosts!
content_old: 11 Hast not Thou, O God, cast us off? And Thou goest not out, O God, with our hosts!

content: 12 Give to us help from adversity, And vain is the salvation of man.
content_old: 12 Give to us help from adversity, And vain is the salvation of man.

content: 1 To the Overseer.—A Psalm of David. O God of my praise, be not silent,
content_old: 1 To the Overseer.—A Psalm of David. O God of my praise, be not silent,

content: 2 For the mouth of wickedness, and the mouth of deceit, Against me they have opened, They have spoken with me—A tongue of falsehood, and words of hatred!
content_old: 2 For the mouth of wickedness, and the mouth of deceit, Against me they have opened, They have spoken with me—A tongue of falsehood, and words of hatred!

content: 3 They have compassed me about, And they fight me without cause.
content_old: 3 They have compassed me about, And they fight me without cause.

content: 4 For my love they oppose me, and I—prayer!
content_old: 4 For my love they oppose me, and I—prayer!

content: 5 And they set against me evil for good, And hatred for my love.
content_old: 5 And they set against me evil for good, And hatred for my love.

content: 6 Appoint Thou over him the wicked, And an adversary standeth at his right hand.
content_old: 6 Appoint Thou over him the wicked, And an adversary standeth at his right hand.

content: 7 In his being judged, he goeth forth wicked, And his prayer is for sin.
content_old: 7 In his being judged, he goeth forth wicked, And his prayer is for sin.

content: 8 His days are few, his oversight another taketh,
content_old: 8 His days are few, his oversight another taketh,

content: 9 His sons are fatherless, and his wife a widow.
content_old: 9 His sons are fatherless, and his wife a widow.

content: 10 And wander continually do his sons, Yea, they have begged, And have sought out of their dry places.
content_old: 10 And wander continually do his sons, Yea, they have begged, And have sought out of their dry places.

content: 11 An exactor layeth a snare for all that he hath, And strangers spoil his labour.
content_old: 11 An exactor layeth a snare for all that he hath, And strangers spoil his labour.

content: 12 He hath none to extend kindness, Nor is there one showing favour to his orphans.
content_old: 12 He hath none to extend kindness, Nor is there one showing favour to his orphans.

content: 13 His posterity is for cutting off, In another generation is their name blotted out.
content_old: 13 His posterity is for cutting off, In another generation is their name blotted out.

content: 14 The iniquity of his fathers Is remembered unto Jehovah, And the sin of his mother is not blotted out.
content_old: 14 The iniquity of his fathers Is remembered unto Jehovah, And the sin of his mother is not blotted out.

content: 15 They are before Jehovah continually, And He cutteth off from earth their memorial.
content_old: 15 They are before Jehovah continually, And He cutteth off from earth their memorial.

content: 16 Because that he hath not remembered to do kindness, And pursueth the poor man and needy, And the smitten of heart—to slay,
content_old: 16 Because that he hath not remembered to do kindness, And pursueth the poor man and needy, And the smitten of heart—to slay,

content: 17 And he loveth reviling, and it meeteth him, And he hath not delighted in blessing, And it is far from him.
content_old: 17 And he loveth reviling, and it meeteth him, And he hath not delighted in blessing, And it is far from him.

content: 18 And he putteth on reviling as his robe, And it cometh in as water into his midst, And as oil into his bones.
content_old: 18 And he putteth on reviling as his robe, And it cometh in as water into his midst, And as oil into his bones.

content: 19 It is to him as apparel—he covereth himself, And for a continual girdle he girdeth it on.
content_old: 19 It is to him as apparel—he covereth himself, And for a continual girdle he girdeth it on.

content: 20 This is the wage of mine accusers from Jehovah, And of those speaking evil against my soul.
content_old: 20 This is the wage of mine accusers from Jehovah, And of those speaking evil against my soul.

content: 21 And Thou, O Jehovah Lord, Deal with me for Thy name’s sake, Because Thy kindness is good, deliver me.
content_old: 21 And Thou, O Jehovah Lord, Deal with me for Thy name’s sake, Because Thy kindness is good, deliver me.

content: 22 For I am poor and needy, And my heart hath been pierced in my midst.
content_old: 22 For I am poor and needy, And my heart hath been pierced in my midst.

content: 23 As a shadow when it is stretched out I have gone, I have been driven away as a locust.
content_old: 23 As a shadow when it is stretched out I have gone, I have been driven away as a locust.

content: 24 My knees have been feeble from fasting, And my flesh hath failed of fatness.
content_old: 24 My knees have been feeble from fasting, And my flesh hath failed of fatness.

content: 25 And I—I have been a reproach to them, They see me, they shake their head.
content_old: 25 And I—I have been a reproach to them, They see me, they shake their head.

content: 26 Help me, O Jehovah my God, Save me, according to Thy kindness.
content_old: 26 Help me, O Jehovah my God, Save me, according to Thy kindness.

content: 27 And they know that this is Thy hand, Thou, O Jehovah, Thou hast done it.
content_old: 27 And they know that this is Thy hand, Thou, O Jehovah, Thou hast done it.

content: 28 They revile, and Thou dost bless, They have risen, and are ashamed, And Thy servant doth rejoice.
content_old: 28 They revile, and Thou dost bless, They have risen, and are ashamed, And Thy servant doth rejoice.

content: 29 Mine accusers put on blushing, and are covered, As an upper robe is their shame.
content_old: 29 Mine accusers put on blushing, and are covered, As an upper robe is their shame.

content: 30 I thank Jehovah greatly with my mouth, And in the midst of many I praise Him,
content_old: 30 I thank Jehovah greatly with my mouth, And in the midst of many I praise Him,

content: 1 A Psalm of David. The affirmation of Jehovah to my Lord: ‘Sit at My right hand, Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.’
content_old: 1 A Psalm of David. The affirmation of Jehovah to my Lord: ‘Sit at My right hand, Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.’

content: 2 The rod of thy strength doth Jehovah send from Zion, Rule in the midst of thine enemies.
content_old: 2 The rod of thy strength doth Jehovah send from Zion, Rule in the midst of thine enemies.

content: 3 Thy people are free-will gifts in the day of Thy strength, in the honours of holiness, From the womb, from the morning, Thou hast the dew of thy youth.
content_old: 3 Thy people are free-will gifts in the day of Thy strength, in the honours of holiness, From the womb, from the morning, Thou hast the dew of thy youth.

content: 4 Jehovah hath sworn, and doth not repent, ‘Thou art a priest to the age, According to the order of Melchizedek.’
content_old: 4 Jehovah hath sworn, and doth not repent, ‘Thou art a priest to the age, According to the order of Melchizedek.’

content: 5 The Lord on thy right hand smote kings In the day of His anger.
content_old: 5 The Lord on thy right hand smote kings In the day of His anger.

content: 6 He doth judge among the nations, He hath completed the carcases, Hath smitten the head over the mighty earth.
content_old: 6 He doth judge among the nations, He hath completed the carcases, Hath smitten the head over the mighty earth.

content: 1 Praise ye Jah! I thank Jehovah with the whole heart, In the secret meeting of the upright, And of the company.
content_old: 1 Praise ye Jah! I thank Jehovah with the whole heart, In the secret meeting of the upright, And of the company.

content: 2 Great are the works of Jehovah, Sought out by all desiring them.
content_old: 2 Great are the works of Jehovah, Sought out by all desiring them.

content: 3 Honourable and majestic is His work, And His righteousness is standing for ever.
content_old: 3 Honourable and majestic is His work, And His righteousness is standing for ever.

content: 4 A memorial He hath made of His wonders, Gracious and merciful is Jehovah.
content_old: 4 A memorial He hath made of His wonders, Gracious and merciful is Jehovah.

content: 5 Prey He hath given to those fearing Him, He remembereth to the age His covenant.
content_old: 5 Prey He hath given to those fearing Him, He remembereth to the age His covenant.

content: 6 The power of His works He hath declared to His people, To give to them the inheritance of nations.
content_old: 6 The power of His works He hath declared to His people, To give to them the inheritance of nations.

content: 7 The works of His hands are true and just, Stedfast are all His appointments.
content_old: 7 The works of His hands are true and just, Stedfast are all His appointments.

content: 8 They are sustained for ever to the age. They are made in truth and uprightness.
content_old: 8 They are sustained for ever to the age. They are made in truth and uprightness.

content: 9 Redemption He hath sent to His people, He hath appointed to the age His covenant, Holy and fearful is His name.
content_old: 9 Redemption He hath sent to His people, He hath appointed to the age His covenant, Holy and fearful is His name.

content: 1 Praise ye Jah! O the happiness of one fearing Jehovah, In His commands he hath delighted greatly.
content_old: 1 Praise ye Jah! O the happiness of one fearing Jehovah, In His commands he hath delighted greatly.

content: 2 Mighty in the earth is his seed, The generation of the upright is blessed.
content_old: 2 Mighty in the earth is his seed, The generation of the upright is blessed.

content: 3 Wealth and riches are in his house, And his righteousness is standing for ever.
content_old: 3 Wealth and riches are in his house, And his righteousness is standing for ever.

content: 4 Light hath risen in darkness to the upright, Gracious, and merciful, and righteous.
content_old: 4 Light hath risen in darkness to the upright, Gracious, and merciful, and righteous.

content: 5 Good is the man—gracious and lending, He sustaineth his matters in judgment.
content_old: 5 Good is the man—gracious and lending, He sustaineth his matters in judgment.

content: 6 For—to the age he is not moved; For a memorial age-during is the righteous.
content_old: 6 For—to the age he is not moved; For a memorial age-during is the righteous.

content: 7 Of an evil report he is not afraid, Prepared is His heart, confident in Jehovah.
content_old: 7 Of an evil report he is not afraid, Prepared is His heart, confident in Jehovah.

content: 8 Sustained is his heart—he feareth not, Till that he look on his adversaries.
content_old: 8 Sustained is his heart—he feareth not, Till that he look on his adversaries.

content: 9 He hath scattered—hath given to the needy, His righteousness is standing for ever, His horn is exalted with honour.
content_old: 9 He hath scattered—hath given to the needy, His righteousness is standing for ever, His horn is exalted with honour.

content: 1 Praise ye Jah! Praise, ye servants of Jehovah. Praise the name of Jehovah.
content_old: 1 Praise ye Jah! Praise, ye servants of Jehovah. Praise the name of Jehovah.

content: 2 The name of Jehovah is blessed, From henceforth, and unto the age.
content_old: 2 The name of Jehovah is blessed, From henceforth, and unto the age.

content: 3 From the rising of the sun unto its going in, Praised is the name of Jehovah.
content_old: 3 From the rising of the sun unto its going in, Praised is the name of Jehovah.

content: 4 High above all nations is Jehovah, Above the heavens is his honour.
content_old: 4 High above all nations is Jehovah, Above the heavens is his honour.

content: 5 Who is as Jehovah our God, He is exalting Himself to sit?
content_old: 5 Who is as Jehovah our God, He is exalting Himself to sit?

content: 6 He is humbling Himself to look On the heavens and on the earth.
content_old: 6 He is humbling Himself to look On the heavens and on the earth.

content: 7 He is raising up from the dust the poor, From a dunghill He exalteth the needy.
content_old: 7 He is raising up from the dust the poor, From a dunghill He exalteth the needy.

content: 8 To cause to sit with princes, With the princes of His people.
content_old: 8 To cause to sit with princes, With the princes of His people.

content: 1 In the going out of Israel from Egypt, The house of Jacob from a strange people,
content_old: 1 In the going out of Israel from Egypt, The house of Jacob from a strange people,

content: 2 Judah became His sanctuary, Israel his dominion.
content_old: 2 Judah became His sanctuary, Israel his dominion.

content: 3 The sea hath seen, and fleeth, The Jordan turneth backward.
content_old: 3 The sea hath seen, and fleeth, The Jordan turneth backward.

content: 4 The mountains have skipped as rams, Heights as sons of a flock.
content_old: 4 The mountains have skipped as rams, Heights as sons of a flock.

content: 5 What—to thee, O sea, that thou fleest? O Jordan, thou turnest back!
content_old: 5 What—to thee, O sea, that thou fleest? O Jordan, thou turnest back!

content: 6 O mountains, ye skip as rams! O heights, as sons of a flock!
content_old: 6 O mountains, ye skip as rams! O heights, as sons of a flock!

content: 7 From before the Lord be afraid, O earth, From before the God of Jacob,
content_old: 7 From before the Lord be afraid, O earth, From before the God of Jacob,

content: 1 Not to us, O Jehovah, not to us, But to Thy name give honour, For Thy kindness, for Thy truth.
content_old: 1 Not to us, O Jehovah, not to us, But to Thy name give honour, For Thy kindness, for Thy truth.

content: 2 Why do the nations say, ‘Where, pray, is their God.
content_old: 2 Why do the nations say, ‘Where, pray, is their God.

content: 3 And our God is in the heavens, All that He hath pleased He hath done.
content_old: 3 And our God is in the heavens, All that He hath pleased He hath done.

content: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, work of man’s hands,
content_old: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, work of man’s hands,

content: 5 A mouth they have, and they speak not, Eyes they have, and they see not,
content_old: 5 A mouth they have, and they speak not, Eyes they have, and they see not,

content: 6 Ears they have, and they hear not, A nose they have, and they smell not,
content_old: 6 Ears they have, and they hear not, A nose they have, and they smell not,

content: 7 Their hands, but they handle not, Their feet, and they walk not;
content_old: 7 Their hands, but they handle not, Their feet, and they walk not;

content: 8 Nor do they mutter through their throat, Like them are their makers, Every one who is trusting in them.
content_old: 8 Nor do they mutter through their throat, Like them are their makers, Every one who is trusting in them.

content: 9 O Israel, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’
content_old: 9 O Israel, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’

content: 10 O house of Aaron, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’
content_old: 10 O house of Aaron, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’

content: 11 Ye fearing Jehovah, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’
content_old: 11 Ye fearing Jehovah, trust in Jehovah, ‘Their help and their shield is He.’

content: 12 Jehovah hath remembered us, He blesseth, He blesseth the house of Israel, He blesseth the house of Aaron,
content_old: 12 Jehovah hath remembered us, He blesseth, He blesseth the house of Israel, He blesseth the house of Aaron,

content: 13 He blesseth those fearing Jehovah, The small with the great.
content_old: 13 He blesseth those fearing Jehovah, The small with the great.

content: 14 Jehovah addeth to you, to you, and to your sons.
content_old: 14 Jehovah addeth to you, to you, and to your sons.

content: 15 Blessed are ye of Jehovah, maker of heaven and earth,
content_old: 15 Blessed are ye of Jehovah, maker of heaven and earth,

content: 16 The heavens—the heavens are Jehovah’s, And the earth He hath given to sons of men,
content_old: 16 The heavens—the heavens are Jehovah’s, And the earth He hath given to sons of men,

content: 17 The dead praise not Jah, Nor any going down to silence.
content_old: 17 The dead praise not Jah, Nor any going down to silence.

content: 1 I have loved, because Jehovah heareth My voice, my supplication,
content_old: 1 I have loved, because Jehovah heareth My voice, my supplication,

content: 2 Because He hath inclined His ear to me, And during my days I call.
content_old: 2 Because He hath inclined His ear to me, And during my days I call.

content: 3 Compassed me have cords of death, And straits of Sheol have found me, Distress and sorrow I find.
content_old: 3 Compassed me have cords of death, And straits of Sheol have found me, Distress and sorrow I find.

content: 4 And in the name of Jehovah I call: I pray Thee, O Jehovah, deliver my soul,
content_old: 4 And in the name of Jehovah I call: I pray Thee, O Jehovah, deliver my soul,

content: 5 Gracious is Jehovah, and righteous, Yea, our God is merciful,
content_old: 5 Gracious is Jehovah, and righteous, Yea, our God is merciful,

content: 6 A preserver of the simple is Jehovah, I was low, and to me He giveth salvation.
content_old: 6 A preserver of the simple is Jehovah, I was low, and to me He giveth salvation.

content: 7 Turn back, O my soul, to thy rest, For Jehovah hath conferred benefits on thee.
content_old: 7 Turn back, O my soul, to thy rest, For Jehovah hath conferred benefits on thee.

content: 8 For Thou hast delivered my soul from death, My eyes from tears, my feet from overthrowing.
content_old: 8 For Thou hast delivered my soul from death, My eyes from tears, my feet from overthrowing.

content: 9 I walk habitually before Jehovah In the lands of the living.
content_old: 9 I walk habitually before Jehovah In the lands of the living.

content: 10 I have believed, for I speak, I—I have been afflicted greatly.
content_old: 10 I have believed, for I speak, I—I have been afflicted greatly.

content: 11 I said in my haste, ‘Every man is a liar.’
content_old: 11 I said in my haste, ‘Every man is a liar.’

content: 12 What do I return to Jehovah? All His benefits are upon me.
content_old: 12 What do I return to Jehovah? All His benefits are upon me.

content: 13 The cup of salvation I lift up, And in the name of Jehovah I call.
content_old: 13 The cup of salvation I lift up, And in the name of Jehovah I call.

content: 14 My vows to Jehovah let me complete, I pray you, before all His people.
content_old: 14 My vows to Jehovah let me complete, I pray you, before all His people.

content: 15 Precious in the eyes of Jehovah is the death for His saints.
content_old: 15 Precious in the eyes of Jehovah is the death for His saints.

content: 16 Cause it to come, O Jehovah, for I am Thy servant. I am Thy servant, son of Thy handmaid, Thou hast opened my bonds.
content_old: 16 Cause it to come, O Jehovah, for I am Thy servant. I am Thy servant, son of Thy handmaid, Thou hast opened my bonds.

content: 17 To Thee I sacrifice a sacrifice of thanks, And in the name of Jehovah I call.
content_old: 17 To Thee I sacrifice a sacrifice of thanks, And in the name of Jehovah I call.

content: 18 My vows to Jehovah let me complete, I pray you, before all His people,
content_old: 18 My vows to Jehovah let me complete, I pray you, before all His people,

content: 1 Praise Jehovah, all ye nations, Glorify Him, all ye peoples.
content_old: 1 Praise Jehovah, all ye nations, Glorify Him, all ye peoples.

content: 1 Give ye thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age is His kindness.
content_old: 1 Give ye thanks to Jehovah, For good, for to the age is His kindness.

content: 2 I pray you, let Israel say, That, to the age is His kindness.
content_old: 2 I pray you, let Israel say, That, to the age is His kindness.

content: 3 I pray you, let the house of Aaron say, That, to the age is His kindness.
content_old: 3 I pray you, let the house of Aaron say, That, to the age is His kindness.

content: 4 I pray you, let those fearing Jehovah say, That, to the age is His kindness.
content_old: 4 I pray you, let those fearing Jehovah say, That, to the age is His kindness.

content: 5 From the straitness I called Jah, Jah answered me in a broad place.
content_old: 5 From the straitness I called Jah, Jah answered me in a broad place.

content: 6 Jehovah is for me, I do not fear what man doth to me.
content_old: 6 Jehovah is for me, I do not fear what man doth to me.

content: 7 Jehovah is for me among my helpers, And I—I look on those hating me.
content_old: 7 Jehovah is for me among my helpers, And I—I look on those hating me.

content: 8 Better to take refuge in Jehovah than to trust in man,
content_old: 8 Better to take refuge in Jehovah than to trust in man,

content: 9 Better to take refuge in Jehovah, Than to trust in princes.
content_old: 9 Better to take refuge in Jehovah, Than to trust in princes.

content: 10 All nations have compassed me about, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.
content_old: 10 All nations have compassed me about, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.

content: 11 They have compassed me about, Yea, they have compassed me about, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.
content_old: 11 They have compassed me about, Yea, they have compassed me about, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.

content: 12 They compassed me about as bees, They have been extinguished as a fire of thorns, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.
content_old: 12 They compassed me about as bees, They have been extinguished as a fire of thorns, In the name of Jehovah I surely cut them off.

content: 13 Thou hast sorely thrust me to fall, And Jehovah hath helped me.
content_old: 13 Thou hast sorely thrust me to fall, And Jehovah hath helped me.

content: 14 My strength and song is Jah, And He is to me for salvation.
content_old: 14 My strength and song is Jah, And He is to me for salvation.

content: 15 A voice of singing and salvation, Is in the tents of the righteous, The right hand of Jehovah is doing valiantly.
content_old: 15 A voice of singing and salvation, Is in the tents of the righteous, The right hand of Jehovah is doing valiantly.

content: 16 The right hand of Jehovah is exalted, The right hand of Jehovah is doing valiantly.
content_old: 16 The right hand of Jehovah is exalted, The right hand of Jehovah is doing valiantly.

content: 17 I do not die, but live, And recount the works of Jah,
content_old: 17 I do not die, but live, And recount the works of Jah,

content: 18 Jah hath sorely chastened me, And to death hath not given me up.
content_old: 18 Jah hath sorely chastened me, And to death hath not given me up.

content: 19 Open ye to me gates of righteousness, I enter into them—I thank Jah.
content_old: 19 Open ye to me gates of righteousness, I enter into them—I thank Jah.

content: 20 This is the gate to Jehovah, The righteous enter into it.
content_old: 20 This is the gate to Jehovah, The righteous enter into it.

content: 21 I thank Thee, for Thou hast answered me, And art to me for salvation.
content_old: 21 I thank Thee, for Thou hast answered me, And art to me for salvation.

content: 22 A stone the builders refused Hath become head of a corner.
content_old: 22 A stone the builders refused Hath become head of a corner.

content: 23 From Jehovah hath this been, It is wonderful in our eyes,
content_old: 23 From Jehovah hath this been, It is wonderful in our eyes,

content: 24 This is the day Jehovah hath made, We rejoice and are glad in it.
content_old: 24 This is the day Jehovah hath made, We rejoice and are glad in it.

content: 25 I beseech Thee, O Jehovah, save, I pray Thee, I beseech Thee, O Jehovah, prosper, I pray Thee.
content_old: 25 I beseech Thee, O Jehovah, save, I pray Thee, I beseech Thee, O Jehovah, prosper, I pray Thee.

content: 26 Blessed is he who is coming In the name of Jehovah, We blessed you from the house of Jehovah,
content_old: 26 Blessed is he who is coming In the name of Jehovah, We blessed you from the house of Jehovah,

content: 27 God is Jehovah, and He giveth to us light, Direct ye the festal-sacrifice with cords, Unto the horns of the altar.
content_old: 27 God is Jehovah, and He giveth to us light, Direct ye the festal-sacrifice with cords, Unto the horns of the altar.

content: 28 My God Thou art, and I confess Thee, My God, I exalt Thee.
content_old: 28 My God Thou art, and I confess Thee, My God, I exalt Thee.

content: 1 Aleph. O the happiness of those perfect in the way, They are walking in the law of Jehovah,
content_old: 1 Aleph. O the happiness of those perfect in the way, They are walking in the law of Jehovah,

content: 2 O the happiness of those keeping His testimonies, With the whole heart they seek Him.
content_old: 2 O the happiness of those keeping His testimonies, With the whole heart they seek Him.

content: 3 Yea, they have not done iniquity, In His ways they have walked.
content_old: 3 Yea, they have not done iniquity, In His ways they have walked.

content: 4 Thou hast commanded us Thy precepts to keep diligently,
content_old: 4 Thou hast commanded us Thy precepts to keep diligently,

content: 5 O that my ways were prepared to keep Thy statutes,
content_old: 5 O that my ways were prepared to keep Thy statutes,

content: 6 Then I am not ashamed In my looking unto all Thy commands.
content_old: 6 Then I am not ashamed In my looking unto all Thy commands.

content: 7 I confess Thee with uprightness of heart, In my learning the judgments of Thy righteousness.
content_old: 7 I confess Thee with uprightness of heart, In my learning the judgments of Thy righteousness.

content: 8 Thy statutes I keep, leave me not utterly!
content_old: 8 Thy statutes I keep, leave me not utterly!

content: 9 Beth. With what doth a young man purify his path? To observe—according to Thy word.
content_old: 9 Beth. With what doth a young man purify his path? To observe—according to Thy word.

content: 10 With all my heart I have sought Thee, Let me not err from Thy commands.
content_old: 10 With all my heart I have sought Thee, Let me not err from Thy commands.

content: 11 In my heart I have hid Thy saying, That I sin not before Thee.
content_old: 11 In my heart I have hid Thy saying, That I sin not before Thee.

content: 12 Blessed art Thou, O Jehovah, teach me Thy statutes.
content_old: 12 Blessed art Thou, O Jehovah, teach me Thy statutes.

content: 13 With my lips I have recounted All the judgments of Thy mouth.
content_old: 13 With my lips I have recounted All the judgments of Thy mouth.

content: 14 In the way of Thy testimonies I have joyed, As over all wealth.
content_old: 14 In the way of Thy testimonies I have joyed, As over all wealth.

content: 15 In Thy precepts I meditate, And I behold attentively Thy paths.
content_old: 15 In Thy precepts I meditate, And I behold attentively Thy paths.

content: 16 In Thy statutes I delight myself, I do not forget Thy word.
content_old: 16 In Thy statutes I delight myself, I do not forget Thy word.

content: 17 Gimel. Confer benefits on Thy servant, I live, and I keep Thy word.
content_old: 17 Gimel. Confer benefits on Thy servant, I live, and I keep Thy word.

content: 18 Uncover mine eyes, and I behold wonders out of Thy law.
content_old: 18 Uncover mine eyes, and I behold wonders out of Thy law.

content: 19 A sojourner I am on earth, Hide not from me Thy commands.
content_old: 19 A sojourner I am on earth, Hide not from me Thy commands.

content: 20 Broken hath my soul for desire Unto Thy judgments at all times.
content_old: 20 Broken hath my soul for desire Unto Thy judgments at all times.

content: 21 Thou hast rebuked the cursed proud, Who are erring from Thy commands.
content_old: 21 Thou hast rebuked the cursed proud, Who are erring from Thy commands.

content: 22 Remove from me reproach and contempt, For Thy testimonies I have kept.
content_old: 22 Remove from me reproach and contempt, For Thy testimonies I have kept.

content: 23 Princes also sat—against me they spoke, Thy servant doth meditate in Thy statutes,
content_old: 23 Princes also sat—against me they spoke, Thy servant doth meditate in Thy statutes,

content: 24 Thy testimonies also are my delight, The men of my counsel!
content_old: 24 Thy testimonies also are my delight, The men of my counsel!

content: 25 Daleth. Cleaved to the dust hath my soul, Quicken me according to Thy word.
content_old: 25 Daleth. Cleaved to the dust hath my soul, Quicken me according to Thy word.

content: 26 My ways I have recounted, And Thou answerest me, teach me Thy statutes,
content_old: 26 My ways I have recounted, And Thou answerest me, teach me Thy statutes,

content: 27 The way of Thy precepts cause me to understand, And I meditate in Thy wonders.
content_old: 27 The way of Thy precepts cause me to understand, And I meditate in Thy wonders.

content: 28 My soul hath dropped from affliction, Establish me according to Thy word.
content_old: 28 My soul hath dropped from affliction, Establish me according to Thy word.

content: 29 The way of falsehood turn aside from me And with Thy law favour me.
content_old: 29 The way of falsehood turn aside from me And with Thy law favour me.

content: 30 The way of faithfulness I have chosen, Thy judgments I have compared,
content_old: 30 The way of faithfulness I have chosen, Thy judgments I have compared,

content: 31 I have adhered to Thy testimonies, O Jehovah, put me not to shame.
content_old: 31 I have adhered to Thy testimonies, O Jehovah, put me not to shame.

content: 32 The way of Thy commands I run, For Thou dost enlarge my heart!
content_old: 32 The way of Thy commands I run, For Thou dost enlarge my heart!

content: 33 He. Show me, O Jehovah, the way of Thy statutes, And I keep it—to the end.
content_old: 33 He. Show me, O Jehovah, the way of Thy statutes, And I keep it—to the end.

content: 34 Cause me to understand, and I keep Thy law, And observe it with the whole heart.
content_old: 34 Cause me to understand, and I keep Thy law, And observe it with the whole heart.

content: 35 Cause me to tread in the path of Thy commands, For in it I have delighted.
content_old: 35 Cause me to tread in the path of Thy commands, For in it I have delighted.

content: 36 Incline my heart unto Thy testimonies, And not unto dishonest gain.
content_old: 36 Incline my heart unto Thy testimonies, And not unto dishonest gain.

content: 37 Remove mine eyes from seeing vanity, In Thy way quicken Thou me.
content_old: 37 Remove mine eyes from seeing vanity, In Thy way quicken Thou me.

content: 38 Establish to Thy servant Thy saying, That is concerning Thy fear.
content_old: 38 Establish to Thy servant Thy saying, That is concerning Thy fear.

content: 39 Remove my reproach that I have feared, For Thy judgments are good.
content_old: 39 Remove my reproach that I have feared, For Thy judgments are good.

content: 40 Lo, I have longed for Thy precepts, In Thy righteousness quicken Thou me,
content_old: 40 Lo, I have longed for Thy precepts, In Thy righteousness quicken Thou me,

content: 41 Waw. And meet me doth Thy kindness, O Jehovah, Thy salvation according to Thy saying.
content_old: 41 Waw. And meet me doth Thy kindness, O Jehovah, Thy salvation according to Thy saying.

content: 42 And I answer him who is reproaching me a word, For I have trusted in Thy word.
content_old: 42 And I answer him who is reproaching me a word, For I have trusted in Thy word.

content: 43 And Thou takest not utterly away From my mouth the word of truth, Because for Thy judgment I have hoped.
content_old: 43 And Thou takest not utterly away From my mouth the word of truth, Because for Thy judgment I have hoped.

content: 44 And I keep Thy law continually, To the age and for ever.
content_old: 44 And I keep Thy law continually, To the age and for ever.

content: 45 And I walk habitually in a broad place, For Thy precepts I have sought.
content_old: 45 And I walk habitually in a broad place, For Thy precepts I have sought.

content: 46 And I speak of Thy testimonies before kings, And I am not ashamed.
content_old: 46 And I speak of Thy testimonies before kings, And I am not ashamed.

content: 47 And I delight myself in Thy commands, That I have loved,
content_old: 47 And I delight myself in Thy commands, That I have loved,

content: 48 And I lift up my hands unto Thy commands, That I have loved, And I do meditate on Thy statutes!
content_old: 48 And I lift up my hands unto Thy commands, That I have loved, And I do meditate on Thy statutes!

content: 49 Zain. Remember the word to Thy servant, On which Thou hast caused me to hope.
content_old: 49 Zain. Remember the word to Thy servant, On which Thou hast caused me to hope.

content: 50 This is my comfort in mine affliction, That Thy saying hath quickened me.
content_old: 50 This is my comfort in mine affliction, That Thy saying hath quickened me.

content: 51 The proud have utterly scorned me, From Thy law I have not turned aside.
content_old: 51 The proud have utterly scorned me, From Thy law I have not turned aside.

content: 52 I remembered Thy judgments of old, O Jehovah, And I comfort myself.
content_old: 52 I remembered Thy judgments of old, O Jehovah, And I comfort myself.

content: 53 Horror hath seized me, Because of the wicked forsaking Thy law.
content_old: 53 Horror hath seized me, Because of the wicked forsaking Thy law.

content: 54 Songs have been to me Thy statutes, In the house of my sojournings.
content_old: 54 Songs have been to me Thy statutes, In the house of my sojournings.

content: 55 I have remembered in the night Thy name, O Jehovah, And I do keep Thy law.
content_old: 55 I have remembered in the night Thy name, O Jehovah, And I do keep Thy law.

content: 56 This hath been to me, That Thy precepts I have kept!
content_old: 56 This hath been to me, That Thy precepts I have kept!

content: 57 Cheth. My portion is Jehovah; I have said—to keep Thy words,
content_old: 57 Cheth. My portion is Jehovah; I have said—to keep Thy words,

content: 58 I appeased Thy face with the whole heart, Favour me according to Thy saying.
content_old: 58 I appeased Thy face with the whole heart, Favour me according to Thy saying.

content: 59 I have reckoned my ways, And turn back my feet unto Thy testimonies.
content_old: 59 I have reckoned my ways, And turn back my feet unto Thy testimonies.

content: 60 I have made haste, And delayed not, to keep Thy commands.
content_old: 60 I have made haste, And delayed not, to keep Thy commands.

content: 61 Cords of the wicked have surrounded me, Thy law I have not forgotten.
content_old: 61 Cords of the wicked have surrounded me, Thy law I have not forgotten.

content: 62 At midnight I rise to give thanks to Thee, For the judgments of Thy righteousness.
content_old: 62 At midnight I rise to give thanks to Thee, For the judgments of Thy righteousness.

content: 63 A companion I am to all who fear Thee, And to those keeping Thy precepts.
content_old: 63 A companion I am to all who fear Thee, And to those keeping Thy precepts.

content: 64 Of Thy kindness, O Jehovah, the earth is full, Thy statutes teach Thou me!
content_old: 64 Of Thy kindness, O Jehovah, the earth is full, Thy statutes teach Thou me!

content: 65 Teth. Good Thou didst with Thy servant, O Jehovah, According to Thy word.
content_old: 65 Teth. Good Thou didst with Thy servant, O Jehovah, According to Thy word.

content: 66 The goodness of reason and knowledge teach me, For in Thy commands I have believed.
content_old: 66 The goodness of reason and knowledge teach me, For in Thy commands I have believed.

content: 67 Before I am afflicted, I—I am erring, And now Thy saying I have kept.
content_old: 67 Before I am afflicted, I—I am erring, And now Thy saying I have kept.

content: 68 Good Thou art, and doing good, Teach me Thy statutes.
content_old: 68 Good Thou art, and doing good, Teach me Thy statutes.

content: 69 Forged against me falsehood have the proud, I with the whole heart keep Thy precepts.
content_old: 69 Forged against me falsehood have the proud, I with the whole heart keep Thy precepts.

content: 70 Insensate as fat hath been their heart, I—in Thy law I have delighted.
content_old: 70 Insensate as fat hath been their heart, I—in Thy law I have delighted.

content: 71 Good for me that I have been afflicted, That I might learn Thy statutes.
content_old: 71 Good for me that I have been afflicted, That I might learn Thy statutes.

content: 72 Better to me is the law of Thy mouth Than thousands of gold and silver!
content_old: 72 Better to me is the law of Thy mouth Than thousands of gold and silver!

content: 73 Yod. Thy hands made me and establish me, Cause me to understand, and I learn Thy commands.
content_old: 73 Yod. Thy hands made me and establish me, Cause me to understand, and I learn Thy commands.

content: 74 Those fearing Thee see me and rejoice, Because for Thy word I have hoped.
content_old: 74 Those fearing Thee see me and rejoice, Because for Thy word I have hoped.

content: 75 I have known, O Jehovah, That righteous are Thy judgments, And in faithfulness Thou hast afflicted me.
content_old: 75 I have known, O Jehovah, That righteous are Thy judgments, And in faithfulness Thou hast afflicted me.

content: 76 Let, I pray Thee, Thy kindness be to comfort me, According to Thy saying to Thy servant.
content_old: 76 Let, I pray Thee, Thy kindness be to comfort me, According to Thy saying to Thy servant.

content: 77 Meet me do Thy mercies, and I live, For Thy law is my delight.
content_old: 77 Meet me do Thy mercies, and I live, For Thy law is my delight.

content: 78 Ashamed are the proud, For with falsehood they dealt perversely with me. I meditate in Thy precepts.
content_old: 78 Ashamed are the proud, For with falsehood they dealt perversely with me. I meditate in Thy precepts.

content: 79 Those fearing Thee turn back to me, And those knowing Thy testimonies.
content_old: 79 Those fearing Thee turn back to me, And those knowing Thy testimonies.

content: 80 My heart is perfect in Thy statutes, So that I am not ashamed.
content_old: 80 My heart is perfect in Thy statutes, So that I am not ashamed.

content: 81 Kaph. Consumed for Thy salvation hath been my soul, For Thy word I have hoped.
content_old: 81 Kaph. Consumed for Thy salvation hath been my soul, For Thy word I have hoped.

content: 82 Consumed have been mine eyes for Thy word, Saying, ‘When doth it comfort me?’
content_old: 82 Consumed have been mine eyes for Thy word, Saying, ‘When doth it comfort me?’

content: 83 For I have been as a bottle in smoke, Thy statutes I have not forgotten.
content_old: 83 For I have been as a bottle in smoke, Thy statutes I have not forgotten.

content: 84 How many are the days of Thy servant? When dost Thou execute Against my pursuers judgment?
content_old: 84 How many are the days of Thy servant? When dost Thou execute Against my pursuers judgment?

content: 85 The proud have digged for me pits, That are not according to Thy law.
content_old: 85 The proud have digged for me pits, That are not according to Thy law.

content: 86 All Thy commands are faithfulness, With falsehood they have pursued me, Help Thou me.
content_old: 86 All Thy commands are faithfulness, With falsehood they have pursued me, Help Thou me.

content: 87 Almost consumed me on earth have they, And I—I have not forsaken Thy precepts.
content_old: 87 Almost consumed me on earth have they, And I—I have not forsaken Thy precepts.

content: 88 According to Thy kindness quicken Thou me, And I keep the testimony of Thy mouth!
content_old: 88 According to Thy kindness quicken Thou me, And I keep the testimony of Thy mouth!

content: 89 Lamed. To the age, O Jehovah, Thy word is set up in the heavens.
content_old: 89 Lamed. To the age, O Jehovah, Thy word is set up in the heavens.

content: 90 To all generations Thy faithfulness, Thou didst establish earth, and it standeth.
content_old: 90 To all generations Thy faithfulness, Thou didst establish earth, and it standeth.
